class.name: gnss_driver/ParserNodelet
class.description: Receive gnss raw data, and parse raw data, publish gnss message.

class.name: gnss_driver/RtcmParserNodelet
class.description: Receive rtcm data, then parse rtcm data and publish gnss ephemeris and observation message.

class.name: gnss_driver/TFBroadcasterNodelet
class.description: Receive odometry msg, then convert to stamped transfrom and sent to tf.
